backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing landing‑page and metadata updates tied to jewellery branding with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing major frontend files and their purposes including landing page, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions with OKLCH variable palette for light/dark mode and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React landing page with jewellery‑themed hero, navigation, calls to action, and sections using icons and styled components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook wiring actor usage for future backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind color and style variables using a sunrise‑inspired palette with balanced light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap creating React root and wrapping the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system using OKLCH variables, custom animations, and typography/plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Arunodaya app’s state, requirements, jewellery-themed positioning updates, and needed image adjustments.
